detail_desc: Playsuit in soft, washed viscose twill with a V-neck, wrapover front and short sleeves with inset ladder stitching. Concealed zip at the back, an elasticated seam and detachable ties at the waist, and side pockets.

Playsuit in soft, washed viscose twill with a V-neck, wrapover front and short sleeves with inset ladder stitching. Concealed zip at the back, an elasticated seam and detachable ties at the waist, and side pockets.
Playsuit in a crêpe weave with a long skirt at the back and a V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover front. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with embroidered details, a regular waist, zip fly with a button and raw-edge hems.
Shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, detachable belt at the waist and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a stripe print. V-neck front and back and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Shirt in cotton twill with a lined jersey hood and press-studs down the front and at the cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets and double-layered legs in different colours.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide lace trim at the hem.

Thong briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow elastication at the sides and a string back.
Pull-on jeans in supersoft, superstretch denim with a drawstring waist, zip fly and press-stud and slim legs with flap leg pockets.

Bandeau jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with support panels in the bodice and a silicone trim at the top. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip in the side and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Straight, wide, ankle-length legs. Lined at the top.

Bandeau jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with support panels in the bodice and a silicone trim at the top. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip in the side and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Straight, wide, ankle-length legs. Lined at the top.
Trainers with a lightly padded edge, lacing at the top and a loop at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trainers with a lightly padded edge, lacing at the top and a loop at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Imitation suede mules with open toes, satin linings and cork wedge heels. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 11 cm.

Dungaree shorts in superstretch twill with adjustable straps and metal fasteners. Pocket at the top, front and back pockets, buttons at the sides and raw-edge hems.

V-neck dress in an airy plumeti weave with a glittery pattern. Seam at the top with gathers, a transparent yoke and long, wide transparent sleeves with ties at the ends. Seam at the waist with ties on both sides and a wide skirt that is longer at the back. Lined.

5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly with a button. Decorative seams on the back pockets and decorative stitching on the legs.

Hobo bag in grained imitation leather with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with button stud fastenings, detachable handle with stitched details and a flap and zip at the top. Zip in each side to make the bag bigger and one inner compartment. Unlined. Size 14x34x35 cm.

Short dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, frills at the top that continue back over the shoulders and an open back with lacing. Concealed zip in one side, elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Jersey inner skirt.
Longer, V-neck cardigan in crushed velvet with a concealed double-breasted fastening at the front, long sleeves with a decorative flounce and a detachable tie belt.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a herringbone weave made from a linen blend with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Welt front pockets and straight, slightly shorter legs.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a frill-trimmed grandad collar and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Bib front with a button placket and pin-tucks, gathered yoke at the back, a narrow, detachable tie belt below the bust and a rounded hem.

Dress in soft washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with decorative buttons down the front. Short, flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the back of the waist and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
